results.content: Plenty of topics, but a little bit hard to catch up sometimes.  Talk too fast and does not have much time digest the code on screen.  Need more explanation on some difficult topics.
results.content_html: Plenty of topics, but a little bit hard to catch up sometimes. Talk too fast and does not have much time digest the code on screen. Need more explanation on some difficult topics.

results.content: I felt this course covered the changes brought to JavaScript by ES6 well. Since I have been coding in ES6 for a while I ran it at 1.75x speed, which made for some quick viewing. As always, make sure you take notes and try examples yourself to get as much learning out of the course as possible.
